data.title: Great place to drink and eat with friends.
data.text: We ordered cheese sticks and pretzels with beer cheese sauce. The Jack Daniels chicken was awesome. The brownie obsession was a good way to top off a good dinner. The service was good and friendly.

data.title: A nice place for a nice meal with friends
data.text: We go to this TGI Fridays several times a year.  We always go with friends before or after a movie or some event.   We are a Stripes Member which gets us free salsa and chips, which sometimes are not very fresh.  Being a Stripes Member gets us points for something free during a future visit.  There is a wait for a table sometimes.  This TGI Fridays is usually very busy.  The servers we get are usually very good and helpful.  The food is usually very good.  We will return many more times in the future.

data.title: Food was ok... Service poor
data.text:
We planned a trip because we received an email for $10 full rack of ribs. We went on 4th if July about 6:30. Maybe only 20 cars in the parking lot. When we walked in they took our name and said 20 minute wait. There were loads of empty tables so they were apparently grossly understaffed. Then we noticed the sign that said "no ribs available until 7" so we sat at the bar and waited to be seated, which was after 7. Then it took the waitress about 10 minutes to acknowledge us and take a drink order. We asked if ribs were now available. She said not yet. Needless to say we went ahead and ordered something different . Really angers me that they were so unprepared. Perhaps they should have or could have offered a discount on something else? 
It was at least 25 minutes for our order to arrive.. Chicken salad and a hamburger. Taste wise they both were tasty. Salad appeared a little wilted and not so fresh. Bbq Burger was fresh and tasty as were the fries

data.title: Happy Hour
data.text: Met a friend for happy hour!!  We ordered appetizers and when the pub pretzels ran out of beer cheese, the awesome bar manager said "Let me see if I can't whip something up for you".  And 5 minutes later he returned and made a wonderful cheese dipping sauce for my pretzels,  Now that's going above and beyond!!!

data.title: Visiting with family
data.text: We waited very briefly for our booth and enjoyed the atmosphere.  The food was hot, tasty and well prepared.  Our server was mediocre and never returned to ask or check on us once the food was served.  Good, clean enjoyable place if you don't require great service.

data.title: Dinner After A Movie
data.text: We received very good service and the staff accommodated our group even though it was nearing closing time - the staff did not try to rush us. Food was fresh and prepared to order. We enjoyed our late dinner and will return when in the area.

data.title: All depends on your luck
data.text: Its a standard TGI, but u either get an awesome server or a not so good one. I just cant get over sometimes, when u go out to have fun and a server is so bad that ruins your night. Server that just disappear its not for me. I gotta say though, they are every where! 😎

data.title: We are here once a week
data.text:
The staff is so friendly, prices are reasonable, they have a good selection of items on their menu including vegetarian and they have a " light section" for those watching their calories even " skinny cocktails" . Their nachos as an appetizer has eight almost pizza slice sized and is a great starter, the sizzling chicken and cheese is also one of my favorites but my husband loves their ribs. 
It's a great place for families and get togethers.

data.title: Tired and Old
data.text: We had lunch here. The silverware was dirty- we asked for a second set- it came wrapped with OLD food still soft & stuck. Dishes looked old and bathrooms not serviced. Our LAST meal there.
